title: The Day Before
timeline: Day 6, Saturday, leading to evening decision
location: The Vault Level 93, then Aria's apartment, then industrial sector between two meeting locations

knows: 8 vault employees show Composite markers including Kauffman
Kauffman's backups show integration markers - she's Composite for 12 years
Someone mirrored her search in real-time using Kauffman's credentials
Kauffman sent warning: original meeting compromised, use Beta-7 coordinates at 2300
Marcus sent warning: don't trust Kauffman, she's part of conspiracy, use original midnight coordinates
Both claim the other is lying
Has two sets of coordinates, must choose
decisions_made: Returned to vault despite knowing risk
Ran analysis on all vault personnel
Wrote insurance message to Chen Park (sends tomorrow noon if she disappears)
Walked to industrial sector between both meeting locations
Must choose: Kauffman (2300) or Marcus (midnight) or neither
aria_chen.internal_state: Final decision point, accepting she can't verify truth, must choose based on incomplete information

planted.element: Personnel analysis showing 8 Composites in vault

active_tensions: Must choose Kauffman or Marcus or neither
Chen Park's genuine concern vs paranoia

chapter_function.plot: Final preparation, personnel analysis, choice point setup for ch07
chapter_function.character: Aria at maximum uncertainty, choosing to act despite impossibility of verification
chapter_function.theme: Choosing without certainty, walking into darkness
chapter_function.reader_engagement: Which meeting will she choose? Cliffhanger into ch07
